sentences.en: Annie led a quiet uneventful life.
sentences.cn: 安妮过着安静平淡的生活。

sentences.en: Endures to be uneventful for a while, back step the boundlessness.
sentences.cn: 忍一时风平浪静, 退一步海阔天空.

sentences.en: He made an uneventful return to normal health.
He was a man designed by Nature for an uneventful life.
sentences.cn: 天生此人,注定他一辈子庸庸碌碌.

sentences.en: Her passage across the Pacific was uneventful.
sentences.cn: 她横穿太平洋的航行是平静的.

sentences.en: In hindsight, it appears that her birth was an uneventful one.
sentences.cn: 之后的迹象表明, 她的出生似乎平淡无奇.

sentences.en: It was rare for her to have an opportunity to discuss her dull, uneventful life.
sentences.cn: 她极少有机会谈论自己枯燥平淡的生活。

sentences.en: Many men before Gautama in that land of uneventful sunshine had found life distressing and mysterious.
sentences.cn: 在这一片平安无事的,阳光和煦的土地上,早在乔答摩之前就有许多人发现生活是烦恼而神秘的.

sentences.en: Megan's arrival on Montserrat was both welcoming and initially uneventful.
sentences.cn: ?梅根到蒙特塞拉特后受到欢迎,最初也平安无事.

sentences.en: Our lives were absolutely monotonous and uneventful.
The colonel dreaded his dunk lonely nights at his farmhouse and the dull, uneventful days.
sentences.cn: 上校对于在农舍里度过的那些阴湿寂寞的夜晚和单调平凡的白天感到很害怕.

sentences.en: The flight was uneventful and we arrived in Paris on schedule time.
sentences.cn: 飞行顺利,准时到达巴黎.

sentences.en: The patient received excision biopsy and had an uneventful postoperative course.
sentences.cn: 因本病例特别罕见,特提出报告并回顾文献加以讨论.

sentences.en: The return journey was uneventful, the car running perfectly.
sentences.cn: 回程波澜不惊，车开得很顺。

sentences.en: Their testimony and cross - examination were uneventful.
sentences.cn: 他们的作证和盘问是平淡无事的.

sentences.en: There were certain days in her life, outwardly uneventful , which Alexandra remembered as peculiarly happy.
sentences.cn: 在她的生活中, 有些日子从表面上看是平静的, 亚历山德拉却把它们看成是最幸福的回忆.

trans.tran_cn: 无特别事件的，无惊人事件的，平静的，平凡的
trans.tran_en: with nothing exciting or unusual happening
